name: Delve (itch) (Dawdle)
description:
Delve is a rhythm-based shooter. Imagine if Just Shapes and Beats and Exit the Gungeon had a baby. Yeah, we're not quite sure how that worked either. Point is, it's a game, and you can play it. 

Music - Matthew K (AKA Rhythmic Revival) and Braeden M 

Programming/Art - John K

Made for Ludum Dare 48
